name: COLONIAL PARK FOR MOBILE HOMES, INC., Appellant, v. NEW BRITAIN TOWNSHIP
name_abbreviation: Colonial Park for Mobile Homes, Inc. v. New Britain Township

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COLONIAL PARK FOR MOBILE HOMES, INC., Appellant, v. NEW BRITAIN TOWNSHIP.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Peter N. Harrison, Doylestown, for appellant.
George M. Bush, Albert Blackman, Doylestown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
445 A.2d 1190
COLONIAL PARK FOR MOBILE HOMES, INC., Appellant, v. NEW BRITAIN TOWNSHIP.
No. 80-3-438.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 21, 1982.
Decided May 19, 1982.
Peter N. Harrison, Doylestown, for appellant.
George M. Bush, Albert Blackman, Doylestown, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
